links.title: Canada arrests Huawei CFO facing US extradition for allegedly violating Iran sanctions
links.description: Canadian authorities told The Globe and Mail that Wanzhou Meng was arrested in Vancouver on Saturday. A spokesman for Canada's Department of Justice told The Globe and Mail that Meng's bail hearing has been scheduled for Friday.

links.title: This is Why The Stock Market May Rebound on December 6
links.description: I'll tell ya what, you would have never known that NASDAQ fell nearly 4% on Tuesday or that the S&P 500 fell 3.25% based on the trading in international markets today. The Shanghai Composite fell just 60 basis point! Yeah, 60 basis points!. The Hong Kong Hang Seng Index fell 1.6%, the Japanese Nikkei fell only 0.5%.
